english.segment1: Unable to socialize. Sleep deprived. Sloping countenance. Raised to be a neurotic. Compulsive. This or something else?
english.segment2: Can you, can you, can you. Can you refrain. No, no, no
english.segment3: Seldom acts of character. Age reduced. High view of yourself. Create an elusive place. A future race. (my question) who treats imbalance?
english.segment4: Can you, can you, can you. Can you refrain. No, no, no.
